title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: VR-Based Science Laboratory Design and Utilization Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Theories (Physics/Chemistry) and Experience with Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform five or more basic science laboratory procedures in a virtual reality (VR) lab environment
Learners can maintain spatial presence at 70% or higher engagement during VR-based learning
Learners can analyze VR experiment results using 3D visualization tools to write lab reports
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
